buttonLabel.description: The label of the button to create from this template. For example, 'Create a New Decision'.

cardKey.description: The card key of the parent under which the template should be instantiated. If not given, the template will be instantiated under the card that includes this macro.

linkType.description: Name of the link type to create

direction.description: Direction of the link. Can be 'inbound' or 'outbound'.

cardKey.description: Either the source of an inbound link or the target of an outbound link
